Hi all,

 

I am also looking for Elliot Freeman. The reason I am looking for these
people is they did not give me their address at the shinsa to send out their
kantei-sho. Also, some addresses didn't get copied entirely, but I have
contacted everyone with problems already. Appreciate any help here. As for
Jerome Newman, he signed G. Jerome Newman, so he might be George Newman.

 

Gordon

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Robson [mailto:robsongo@...] 
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 2004 12:06 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Jerome Newman

 

Hi all,



Is Jerome Newman out there somewhere or does someone know him? He failed to
give us his mailing address so we can send his kanteisho to him. Please
contact me privately.



Gordon
